name: GB Studio Tracks Vol. 1
description:
3 .mod files ready to use in your GB Studio projects.
Tracks were written having in mind the real hardware - best sound is achieved there!

Full GB Studio 1.2.1 project is included.
This project can also teach you some basics on designing User interfaces.

This is a  free download, but any donation is welcome!

Thanks for your support!
